title: Is the AI Talent Battle Heating Up Between Elon Musk and OpenAI?
description: Elon Musk’s electric vehicle (EV) giant, Tesla Inc., has been losing engineers to OpenAI, according to a revelation that underscores the intensifying AI talent battle. Following rumors that Ethan Knight, the machine learning scientist at Tesla, had left the company to join Elon Musk’s other startup, xAI, there is now a high-stakes talent competition developing. […]

title: Pushd stage 6 wins over Bitcoin Cash, Dogecoin market movers
description: Pushd captures the crypto community's attention, setting its sights on becoming a formidable Amazon competitor by harnessing Bitcoin Cash's efficiency and Dogecoin's community spirit. #partnercontent

title: Crypto’s New Epicenter: Asia’s Rising Influence
description:
Actions by US regulators throughout 2023 that tend to be unfriendly to the crypto industry have prompted several companies to start withdrawing and looking for safer areas. Asia welcomes this opportunity to become a friendlier and more profitable Web3 and crypto business environment for industry players and investors. Lennix Lai (Chief Commercial Officer, OKX) said […]

The post Crypto’s New Epicenter: Asia’s Rising Influence appeared first on Coin Edition.
